description.gold-silver:
Jabs the foe twice
using stingers.
description.crystal:
Jabs the foe twice
using stingers.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Stingers on the forelegs
jab the foe twice.
description.emerald:
Stingers on the forelegs
jab the foe twice.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is stabbed
twice with foreleg
stingers. It may
poison the foe.
description.diamond-pearl:
The foe is stabbed
twice by a pair of
stingers.
It may also poison
the target.
description.platinum:
The foe is stabbed
twice by a pair of
stingers.
It may also poison
the target.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The foe is stabbed
twice by a pair of
stingers.
It may also poison
the target.
description.black-white:
The user damages the target twice in
succession by jabbing it with two spikes.
It may also poison the target.

The user damages the target twice in
succession by jabbing it with two spikes.
It may also poison the target.

The user damages the target twice in
succession by jabbing it with two spikes.
This may also poison the target.

The user damages the target twice in
succession by jabbing it with two spikes.
This may also poison the target.
description.sun-moon:
The user damages the target twice in succession
by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison

The user damages the target twice in succession

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
effect.shortEffect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
